backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining chatrooms, messages, users, reactions, access control, and a resetData admin function with extensive state maps and type definitions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend features, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of all major frontend files.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file bootstrapping the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining lobby, chatroom, and admin routes with conditional header and footer rendering.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Avatar picker dialog supporting uploads, Giphy search, GIF selection, and avatar removal with debounced search and upload handling.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Chat UI handling message display, auto-scroll, replies, pinned video, and message sending with header collapse logic.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with media thumbnails, live status, and optional Twitter or Twitch previews, fetching thumbnails and oEmbed data when needed.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Provides a dialog to create a new chatroom with topic, description, category, and optional media (image upload, video URL, or Twitter post) including validation and previews.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with navigation, username editing, and avatar selection, adapting layout when inside a chatroom.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: No-op placeholder component that renders nothing and maintains anonymous usage.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with timestamps, reactions, media previews, replies, and optional Twitter embeds, supporting pinning and user interactions.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Provides a message composer with text, image upload, video URL, Twitter URL, and optional voice recording, handling validation and uploads.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Shows a pinned YouTube or Twitch video for a chatroom with an option to unpin it.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio message player with waveform visualization, duration loading, playback sync, and slider control.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Ensures chatrooms are freshly fetched once when the actor becomes ready, removing bad cache and recovering from empty results.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for chatrooms, messages, profiles, and reactions with local helpers and retry/guard logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode, mobile input tweaks, and voice message slider styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Formats numbers into compact human‑readable units like k, M, and B.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Provides functions to search and fetch trending GIFs from Giphy and map API responses to a simple GIF format with error handling.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Implements client‑side image compression with resizing, quality control, progress reporting, and fallbacks for unsupported or uncompressible files.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches and reconstructs lightweight Twitter oEmbed previews with caching, deduped requests, and HTML parsing for text and images.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed previews with versioning, validation, expiration, and clear helpers.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Extracts IDs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter URLs and generates thumbnail or embed URLs with helper type checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page requiring a password to view and delete chatrooms, using React Query for data fetching and sessionStorage for auth state.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Displays a chatroom by ID, handling actor and chatroom loading states, view-count increment, and error fallback before rendering ChatArea.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Shows the chatroom lobby with search, category filters, loading states, and navigation, plus a create-chatroom dialog.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theming, colors, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing requirements and constraints for adding a site‑wide data reset feature with security concerns and pending requests.
